title: Rune Pages From Old Era?
body:
Before the revamp of the client, I had bought a 7 runepage bundle...right now I have 6 avalible to me instead of 8 or 9

Is there a fix for this?

replies.body: Hey, I looked into this for you personally but I was unable to see anything that would exceed the pages you currently have or a bundle purchase.  Feel free to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team can offer more context!
